com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt

Class ValidatingTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.ValidatingTrainer

  • public class ValidatingTrainer
extends Object
    This training class attempts to manage the sample size hyperparameter and convergence criteria via the periodic evaluation of a validation function. It uses an itermediate "epoch" loop where a target learning improvement and overtraining ratio are sought. It also supports multiple stages to each epoch, allowing use cases such as GAN and layerwise training.
